projects.name: towa
projects.description: towa is a web-based viewer for DeepZoom tiled images, built using Vite.js, React, and the OpenSeadragon image-viewing library.

projects.name: DongoDB
projects.description: DongoDB is a sharded, fault-tolerant, RESTful key-value store built using Quart and asyncio. It enforces causal consistency through a vector clock mechanism, and was designed to be simple and horizontally scalable using Docker.
